title: Fans want Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight at Trump's Mar-a-Lago as this video goes viral
content: Now that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went to Mar-a-Lago to meet Donald Trump and then they dined together, X users want the Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight to take place at Mar-a-Lago. Speculations of a cage fight between the two have been going around for many months and now the old video of Elon Musk saying he's ready to fight Zuckerberg any place, any time, any rules is going viral.
summary: Now that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went to Mar-a-Lago to meet Donald Trump and then they dined together, X users want the Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight to take place at Mar-a-Lago. Speculations of a cage fight between the two have been going around for many months and now the old video of Elon Musk saying he's ready to fight Zuckerberg any place, any time, any rules is going viral.

title: 'Fitting tribute': How massive Trump ‘Fight Fight Fight’ statue celebrates his legacy
content: ​The statue commemorates a moment etched into public memory: Trump, bloodied but unbroken, raising his fist in defiance after surviving an attack during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, last July. The image, captured by Associated Press photographer Evan Vucci, quickly became a cultural phenomenon, hailed as a symbol of strength by his supporters and a powerful snapshot of a deeply divided nation.
summary: ​The statue commemorates a moment etched into public memory: Trump, bloodied but unbroken, raising his fist in defiance after surviving an attack during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, last July. The image, captured by Associated Press photographer Evan Vucci, quickly became a cultural phenomenon, hailed as a symbol of strength by his supporters and a powerful snapshot of a deeply divided nation.

title: Will IRS be deleted by DOGE? Elon Musk says...
content: “The IRS just said it wants $20B more money. Do you think its budget should be: Increased, Same, Decreased, Deleted,” Musk asked in the poll. And more than 60 per cent of users polled in favor of deleting its budget. Only 3.9 per cent said the federal agency’s budget should remain the same, 5. 6 per cent felt it deserved more money and 29.9 per cent said the IRS budget should be decreased.
summary: “The IRS just said it wants $20B more money. Do you think its budget should be: Increased, Same, Decreased, Deleted,” Musk asked in the poll. And more than 60 per cent of users polled in favor of deleting its budget. Only 3.9 per cent said the federal agency’s budget should remain the same, 5. 6 per cent felt it deserved more money and 29.9 per cent said the IRS budget should be decreased.

title: Donald Trump's Thanksgiving wish for 'Radical Left Lunatics'
content: Trump’s message struck a defiant tone, emphasizing his belief in the failure of his political opponents' policies, which he described as “hopelessly bad.” He celebrated what he called a “landslide victory” for those aligned with his "Make America Great Again" movement, attributing the outcome to the enduring values of the American people. Though he didn’t specify the context of the victory, the remarks come amid a period of heightened political activity as he continues to position himself as a central figure in the Republican Party.
summary: Trump’s message struck a defiant tone, emphasizing his belief in the failure of his political opponents' policies, which he described as “hopelessly bad.” He celebrated what he called a “landslide victory” for those aligned with his "Make America Great Again" movement, attributing the outcome to the enduring values of the American people. Though he didn’t specify the context of the victory, the remarks come amid a period of heightened political activity as he continues to position himself as a central figure in the Republican Party.

title: DEI workshops on caste and race narratives have proven counterproductive, study reveals
content: A study by the NCRI reveals certain DEI workshops, particularly those focused on caste and race, are counterproductive, fostering division. CasteFiles advocates for balanced discussions on identity, criticizing media for overlooking the study and amplifying biased narratives while suppressing counter-arguments. They've filed legal complaints against universities like Rutgers, alleging harm from caste-focused training.
summary: A study by the NCRI reveals certain DEI workshops, particularly those focused on caste and race, are counterproductive, fostering division.  CasteFiles advocates for balanced discussions on identity, criticizing media for overlooking the study and amplifying biased narratives while suppressing counter-arguments. They've filed legal complaints against universities like Rutgers, alleging harm from caste-focused training.

title: 90 victims identified in new sexual assault claims against late billionaire Mohamed Al-Fayed, say London police
content: London's Metropolitan Police are investigating over 90 victims of alleged sexual assault by the late Mohamed Al-Fayed, former Harrods owner. Following a BBC documentary and subsequent public appeal, over 400 women and witnesses have come forward with accusations. The investigation now includes individuals potentially complicit in Al-Fayed's alleged crimes, reviewing past cases for missed opportunities.
summary: London's Metropolitan Police are investigating over 90 victims of alleged sexual assault by the late Mohamed Al-Fayed, former Harrods owner. Following a BBC documentary and subsequent public appeal, over 400 women and witnesses have come forward with accusations. The investigation now includes individuals potentially complicit in Al-Fayed's alleged crimes, reviewing past cases for missed opportunities.

title: Lebanon parliament to meet on January 9 to elect president
content: Lebanon's parliament will convene on January 9 to elect a new president, aiming to fill the void left since October 2022. This follows a recent ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah, with hopes that the truce will pave the way for political progress. Prime Minister Mikati and Hezbollah chief Naim Qassem have both expressed optimism about the upcoming election.
summary: Lebanon's parliament will convene on January 9 to elect a new president, aiming to fill the void left since October 2022.  This follows a recent ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah, with hopes that the truce will pave the way for political progress.  Prime Minister Mikati and Hezbollah chief Naim Qassem have both expressed optimism about the upcoming election.

title: Landslide triggered by rain in Indonesia's Sumatra island kills at least 7 people
content: Seven people died after a landslide engulfed a tourist bus in North Sumatra, Indonesia. The bus, along with other vehicles, had been trapped since Wednesday due to torrential rains. Rescuers recovered the bodies and evacuated the injured. This incident follows another landslide earlier in the week that claimed 20 lives in the same region.
summary: Seven people died after a landslide engulfed a tourist bus in North Sumatra, Indonesia.  The bus, along with other vehicles, had been trapped since Wednesday due to torrential rains.  Rescuers recovered the bodies and evacuated the injured.  This incident follows another landslide earlier in the week that claimed 20 lives in the same region.

title: US man arrested at Los Angeles airport for smuggling meth soaked in over 30 kilograms of clothing
content: A California man, Raj Matharu, 39, was arrested at LAX for attempting to smuggle methamphetamine to Sydney. He was caught with over one kilogram of the drug concealed within clothing in his checked luggage. The clothes, including a cow onesie, were coated in meth, likely soaked and dried. Matharu was released on bond and faces a court hearing.
summary: A California man, Raj Matharu, 39, was arrested at LAX for attempting to smuggle methamphetamine to Sydney.  He was caught with over one kilogram of the drug concealed within clothing in his checked luggage. The clothes, including a cow onesie, were coated in meth, likely soaked and dried. Matharu was released on bond and faces a court hearing.

title: 'I’ve never felt more unhealthy': Author tries Donald Trump's fast-food-based diet for a week
content: Gareth Davies, in a dietary experiment, replicated Donald Trump's fast-food-centric eating habits for a week. The results were alarming, with Davies experiencing significant health decline, including weight loss from dehydration, low energy, and difficulty exercising. He described the diet as unhealthy and unsustainable, echoing concerns from RFK Jr. and nutritionist Sam Rice.
summary: Gareth Davies, in a dietary experiment, replicated Donald Trump's fast-food-centric eating habits for a week. The results were alarming, with Davies experiencing significant health decline, including weight loss from dehydration, low energy, and difficulty exercising. He described the diet as unhealthy and unsustainable, echoing concerns from RFK Jr. and nutritionist Sam Rice.

title: Why Judge Subramanian denied bail for Sean 'Diddy' Combs despite $50 million offer from his defence
content: Hip-hop mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs remains in federal custody after a judge denied his third bail request. Prosecutors argued Combs obstructed justice by contacting witnesses through banned communication services and used social media to influence public opinion.
summary: Hip-hop mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs remains in federal custody after a judge denied his third bail request. Prosecutors argued Combs obstructed justice by contacting witnesses through banned communication services and used social media to influence public opinion.

title: 'Lol wut': Joe Rogan responds to ABC's Kim Williams 'deeply repulsive' remarks on his podcast
content: Australian Broadcasting Corporation head Kim Williams criticized Joe Rogan's podcast, calling it "deeply repulsive" and accusing Rogan of exploiting fear and anxiety. Rogan responded dismissively on X. Williams expressed disbelief at Rogan's popularity, particularly in the US, where his interviews, including one with President-elect Trump, have garnered a significant audience.
summary: Australian Broadcasting Corporation head Kim Williams criticized Joe Rogan's podcast, calling it "deeply repulsive" and accusing Rogan of exploiting fear and anxiety. Rogan responded dismissively on X. Williams expressed disbelief at Rogan's popularity, particularly in the US, where his interviews, including one with President-elect Trump, have garnered a significant audience.

title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg joins Donald Trump for dinner at Mar-a-Lago
content: Former President Trump and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg dined at Mar-a-Lago, sparking discussion about their evolving relationship. Zuckerberg, among other business leaders, was invited to discuss Trump's economic plans for his potential second term. This meeting follows Meta's reinstatement of Trump's account after a ban following the January 6th Capitol attack.
summary: Former President Trump and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg dined at Mar-a-Lago, sparking discussion about their evolving relationship. Zuckerberg, among other business leaders, was invited to discuss Trump's economic plans for his potential second term. This meeting follows Meta's reinstatement of Trump's account after a ban following the January 6th Capitol attack.

title: Millionaire Shark Tank judge calls Harris a 'complete loser'
content: Kevin O'Leary criticized Kamala Harris's presidential bid, calling her a "faulty and broken candidate." He questioned the Democratic Party's decision to bypass a primary contest and appoint her, citing her past failures and inability to articulate a clear vision. O'Leary also highlighted internal doubts within the party about Harris's leadership capabilities and criticized her weak performance on The View.
summary: Kevin O'Leary criticized Kamala Harris's presidential bid, calling her a "faulty and broken candidate." He questioned the Democratic Party's decision to bypass a primary contest and appoint her, citing her past failures and inability to articulate a clear vision. O'Leary also highlighted internal doubts within the party about Harris's leadership capabilities and criticized her weak performance on The View.

title: US sanctions Venezuela security chiefs for crackdown
content: The US imposed sanctions on 21 Venezuelan officials, including security and cabinet members, following President Maduro's contested re-election.
summary: The US imposed sanctions on 21 Venezuelan officials, including security and cabinet members, following President Maduro's contested re-election.

title: 'He's trying to kill me!': Florida man charged with murder after beating golfer to death
content: A horrifying incident unfolded at Sandhill Crane Golf Club near West Palm Beach where a 65-year-old golfer, Brian Hiltebeitel, was fatally attacked. 36-year-old Junior Boucher is accused of bludgeoning Hiltebeitel with golf clubs and choking him in a pond after a chase. Witnesses heard the victim's desperate cries for help.
summary: A horrifying incident unfolded at Sandhill Crane Golf Club near West Palm Beach where a 65-year-old golfer, Brian Hiltebeitel, was fatally attacked. 36-year-old Junior Boucher is accused of bludgeoning Hiltebeitel with golf clubs and choking him in a pond after a chase. Witnesses heard the victim's desperate cries for help.

title: 'Baseless, without factual or legal foundation': Israel to appeal to ICC on arrest warrant against Netanyahu
'Violent, UnAmerican': Bomb and swatting threats against Trump's cabinet picks
content: Multiple members of Donald Trump's incoming administration were targeted with bomb threats and swatting incidents, including a pipe bomb threat with a pro-Palestinian message. Elise Stefanik, Matt Gaetz, Lori Chavez-DeRemer, and Lee Zeldin were among those targeted. Zeldin confirmed a pipe bomb threat against his family.
summary: Multiple members of Donald Trump's incoming administration were targeted with bomb threats and swatting incidents, including a pipe bomb threat with a pro-Palestinian message. Elise Stefanik, Matt Gaetz, Lori Chavez-DeRemer, and Lee Zeldin were among those targeted. Zeldin confirmed a pipe bomb threat against his family.

title: New Ohio law restricts transgender students’ access to school restrooms, 'bathroom bill' sparks outcry
content: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine recently signed the "Protect All Students Act," effectively barring transgender students from using school facilities aligning with their gender identity. This "bathroom bill" impacts public and private institutions, sparking both applause for protecting privacy and safety and condemnation for targeting vulnerable youth.
summary: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine recently signed the "Protect All Students Act," effectively barring transgender students from using school facilities aligning with their gender identity. This "bathroom bill" impacts public and private institutions, sparking both applause for protecting privacy and safety and condemnation for targeting vulnerable youth.

title: Kamala Harris' step-daughter Ella Emhoff trolled over fashion event appearance: 'Not model material'
content: Ella Emhoff, Kamala Harris's stepdaughter, was criticized online after attending a fashion event as social media users commented on her appearance and emotional state. Podcaster Benny Johnson wrote, "I don't think live in the same country as these people." "If the Hunger Games were real," one post read. "These people are broken beyond repair. This woke mind virus is real!" one wrote.

Podcaster Benny Johnson wrote, "I don't think live in the same country as these people." "If the Hunger Games were real," one post read. "These people are broken beyond repair.
